features: MOISTURIZING CONDITIONER: Dove Ultra Intensive Repair Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner visibly repairs and protects hair in 30 seconds
FAST-DETANGLE TECHNOLOGY: This ultra-fast detangle concentrated hair conditioner formula efficiently penetrates hair strands and repairs and protects to transform damaged hair

ULTRA CONCENTRATE CONDITIONER: This damage repair conditioner contains 100 percent more Fiber Repair Activity per concentrate drop and uses less plastic per wash (vs. non-concentrated Intensive Repair)
2X MORE WASHES: 1 bottle of Dove Ultra Intensive Repair Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner equals 2 bottles of non-concentrated shampoo. Just use half your usual dose (yes, that's enough)
HOW TO USE: After shampooing, squeeze ONLY HALF of your usual dose (yes, that’s enough) and massage the gel-like conditioner as usual in wet hair
body.description: The Dove Ultra Intensive Repair Shampoo and Conditioner system visibly repairs and restores damaged hair in just 30 seconds. Using only half of your usual dose, this ultra-fast detangle concentrated conditioner formula efficiently penetrates hair strands and delivers visible repair, restoring and shielding damaged hair in just 30 seconds. Brushing, heat and washing can damage hair and break essential hair bonds, resulting in dull and unmanageable hair. The conditioner for damaged hair formula helps to visibly repair and progressively nourish damaged hair with continuous use when used as a system, so you can help protect your hair against future damage with this nourishing conditioner. Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner, formulated with Bio-Nourish, helps your hair to recover from damage in two different ways. The formula repairs signs of surface damage, making your hair look and feel smooth and strong against breakage. By helping to reinforce your hair against breakage, it can also prevent the appearance of split ends and damage caused by coloring and heat styling. This hair conditioner for damaged hair contains 100 percent more Fiber Repair Activity per drop, provides 2X more washes and uses 50 percent less plastic per wash.* How to use the Dove Intensive Repair System: Step 1: Squeeze ONLY HALF of your usual dose (yes, that's enough) and massage the gel-like shampoo in wet hair. Step 2: After shampooing, squeeze ONLY HALF of your usual dose (yes, that’s enough) and massage the gel-like conditioner as usual in wet hair. Step 3: Rinse and experience hair that feels stronger.*vs. non-concentrated Intensive Repair 20oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product. Every time I use it my hair is so soft, full of body, and easy to style. A little goes a long way. Plus I can go 3 days until I have to wash my hair again. A definite bonus!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Llego en excelente estado el producto muchas gracias

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Shampoo!!
reviews.reviewText: I discovered Dove shampoo a few years ago and haven't used anything since! It's good to my hair which I color every three weeks. In the dead of winter I use Dove's amazing conditioner to avoid static. I'm a fan for life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: LOVE IT! My hair feels amazing after using it, and love the smell. And the best part IS CRUELTY FREE!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well but smell is kind of chemical or bad perfume like.
reviews.reviewText: I'm still going to finish the bottle, it's very concentrated, a little does go a long way. Great for getting the tangles out but I just don't like the strong scent. Wish they had something lighter or citrus maybe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my hair.
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. My hair feels so soft after using!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars La mejora del cabello
reviews.reviewText: El kit de shampoo y acondicionador Ultra Dove Intensive Repair es un dúo dinámico que ofrece una experiencia revitalizante para el cabello. Desde el primer uso, el shampoo proporciona una limpieza suave pero efectiva, eliminando impurezas sin dejar el cabello reseco. El acondicionador, por su parte, es como un bálsamo nutritivo que se funde en cada hebra, dejando el cabello suave, manejable y notablemente más saludable.Lo que realmente destaca de este kit es su fórmula de reparación intensiva. Con el tiempo, he notado una mejora significativa en la textura y el brillo de mi cabello. Los ingredientes parecen trabajar en conjunto para fortalecer y restaurar, lo que es especialmente beneficioso para aquellos que luchan con daños causados por el calor, el peinado y los elementos ambientales.Además de su eficacia, el aroma delicado y duradero que dejan en el cabello es un detalle encantador. La sensación de cuidado y lujo que proporciona este kit hace que cada uso se convierta en un momento de indulgencia. En definitiva, el kit de shampoo y acondicionador Ultra Dove Intensive Repair es una inversión en la salud y el bienestar capilar, brindando resultados que superan las expectativas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves hair shiny
reviews.reviewText: I live in a very low humidity area. This conditioner when used daily leaves my hair soft and shiny. Some of the best I have found and reasonably priced.
